</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,99 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+/**
+ * Always allows every request.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class AlwaysAllowAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasiccrestAlwaysDenyAuthorizationModulejava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,121 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Denies allows every request.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    private final String endpoint;
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule}.
+     *
+     * @param endpoint The protected endpoint.
+     */
+    public AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule(String endpoint) {
+        this.endpoint = endpoint;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasiccrestBasicAuthorizationConnectionFactoryjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,109 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.AuthorizationFilters;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ConnectionFactory;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.Resources;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.Router;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.resource.RoutingMode.STARTS_WITH;
+
+/**
+ * Factory class for getting the {@code ConnectionFactory} instance that has all of the CREST routes.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public final class BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory {
+
+    private static final SimpleResource SIMPLE_RESOURCE = new SimpleResource();
+
+    /**
+     * Private utility constructor.
+     */
+    private BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory() {
+        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(&quot;BasicAuthorizationConnectionFactory cannot be instantiated.&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a {@link ConnectionFactory} instance with all the (non-)protected endpoints.
+     *
+     * @return A {@code ConnectionFactory} instance.
+     */
+    public static ConnectionFactory getConnectionFactory() {
+
+        final Router router = new Router();
+
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/simple&quot;, createEndpointCheckerHandler());
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/notAction&quot;, createNotActionHandler());
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/notCreateOrPatch&quot;, createNotCreateOrPatchHandler());
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/none&quot;, createNoneHandler());
+
+        return Resources.newInternalConnectionFactory(router);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates an authorization filter request handler which allows requests to the {@code user}s endpoint and denies
+     * requests to the {@code role}s endpoint.
+     *
+     * @return A {@code RequestHandler}.
+     */
+    private static RequestHandler createEndpointCheckerHandler() {
+        final Router router = new Router();
+
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/users&quot;, AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                new AlwaysAllowAuthorizationModule()));
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/roles&quot;, AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                new AlwaysDenyAuthorizationModule(&quot;roles&quot;)));
+
+        return router;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates an authorization filter request handler which denies action requests.
+     *
+     * @return A no action {@code RequestHandler}.
+     */
+    private static RequestHandler createNotActionHandler() {
+        return AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                new NotActionAuthorizationModule());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates an authorization filter request handler which denies create and patch requests.
+     *
+     * @return A no create or patch {@code RequestHandler}.
+     */
+    private static RequestHandler createNotCreateOrPatchHandler() {
+        return AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                new NotCreateAuthorizationModule(), new NotPatchAuthorizationModule());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates an authorization filter request handler which denies all requests.
+     *
+     * @return A deny all {@code RequestHandler}.
+     */
+    private static RequestHandler createNoneHandler() {
+        return AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                new NotCreateAuthorizationModule(), new NotReadAuthorizationModule(),
+                new NotUpdateAuthorizationModule(), new NotDeleteAuthorizationModule(),
+                new NotPatchAuthorizationModule(), new NotActionAuthorizationModule(),
+                new NotQueryAuthorizationModule());
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasiccrestNotActionAuthorizationModulejava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/NotActionAuthorizationModule.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/NotActionAuthorizationModule.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/NotActionAuthorizationModule.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,106 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.

+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.

+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.

+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.failure;
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.success;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Allows every request except for action requests.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class NotActionAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(failure(&quot;Action is not allowed&quot;,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>

+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.failure;
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.success;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Allows every request except for create requests.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class NotCreateAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(failure(&quot;Create is not allowed&quot;,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+}

<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/crest/NotDeleteAuthorizationModule.java                                (rev 0)

</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,106 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the

+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.

+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.failure;
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.success;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Allows every request except for delete requests.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class NotDeleteAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(failure(&quot;Delete is not allowed&quot;,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>

</span><ins>+/*

+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.failure;
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult.success;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Allows every request except for patch requests.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class NotPatchAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(failure(&quot;Patch is not allowed&quot;,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(success());
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>

+

+     */
+    @Override

+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResult;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResultHandler;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.Resource;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResultHandler;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Simple {@link CollectionResourceProvider} that just echos back the operation performed.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class SimpleResource implements CollectionResourceProvider {
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void actionCollection(ServerContext context, ActionRequest request, ResultHandler&lt;JsonValue&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;actionCollection&quot;))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void actionInstance(ServerContext context, String resourceId, ActionRequest request,
+            ResultHandler&lt;JsonValue&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;action&quot;))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void createInstance(ServerContext context, CreateRequest request, ResultHandler&lt;Resource&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;create&quot;)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void deleteInstance(ServerContext context, String resourceId, DeleteRequest request,
+            ResultHandler&lt;Resource&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;delete&quot;)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void patchInstance(ServerContext context, String resourceId, PatchRequest request,
+            ResultHandler&lt;Resource&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;patch&quot;)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void queryCollection(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request, QueryResultHandler handler) {
+        handler.handleResource(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;queryCollection&quot;)))));
+        handler.handleResult(new QueryResult());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void readInstance(ServerContext context, String resourceId, ReadRequest request,
+            ResultHandler&lt;Resource&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;read&quot;)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public void updateInstance(ServerContext context, String resourceId, UpdateRequest request,
+            ResultHandler&lt;Resource&gt; handler) {
+        handler.handleResult(new Resource(&quot;0&quot;, &quot;0&quot;, json(object(field(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;update&quot;)))));
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasiccrestpackageinfojava"></a>

<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/BasicAuthorizationFactory.java (0 => 2063)</h4>

</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.servlet;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.AuthorizationModuleFactory;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.AuthorizationModules.newAuthorizationModuleFactory;
+
+/**
+ * Factory class for creating an {@link AuthorizationModuleFactory} which will return the
+ * {@link org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.api.HttpServletAuthorizationModule} instance that will be used to protect
+ * access to resources by performing authorization on each incoming request.
+ */
+public final class BasicAuthorizationFactory {
+
+    /**
+     * Private utility constructor.
+     */
+    private BasicAuthorizationFactory() { }
+
+    /**
+     * Returns a new {@link AuthorizationModuleFactory} which contains the {@code HttpServletAuthorizationModule} which
+     * will be used to protect access to resources by performing authorization on each incoming request.
+     *
+     * @return A new {@code AuthorizationModuleFactory} which contains the {@code HttpServletAuthorizationModule} which
+     * will perform the authorization of requests.
+     */
+    public static AuthorizationModuleFactory getAuthorizationModuleFactory() {
+        return newAuthorizationModuleFactory(new HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule(new EndpointChecker()));
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasicservletEndpointCheckerjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/EndpointChecker.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/EndpointChecker.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/EndpointChecker.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.servlet;
+
+import java.util.HashSet;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+/**
+ * Simply checks if the endpoint is &quot;allowed&quot; or not.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class EndpointChecker {
+
+    private final Set&lt;String&gt; allowedEndpoints = new HashSet&lt;String&gt;();
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code EndpointChecker} instance, which only allows requests to the {@code users} endpoint.
+     */
+    public EndpointChecker() {
+        allowedEndpoints.add(&quot;users&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Checks to see if access to the specified endpoint is allowed.
+     *
+     * @param endpoint The requested  endpoint.
+     * @return {@code true} if access to the endpoint is allowed.
+     */
+    public boolean check(String endpoint) {
+        return allowedEndpoints.contains(endpoint);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasicservletHttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModulejava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/basic/servlet/HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,83 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.servlet;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationContext;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationException;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.api.HttpServletAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+
+import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * A {@code HttpServletAuthorizationModule} that only allows access to the {@code users} endpoint.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5..0
+ */
+public class HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule implements HttpServletAuthorizationModule {
+
+    private final EndpointChecker endpointChecker;
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     *
+     * @param endpointChecker An {@code EndpointChecker} instance.
+     */
+    public HttpServletEndpointCheckerAuthorizationModule(EndpointChecker endpointChecker) {
+        this.endpointChecker = endpointChecker;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Authorizes all requests to the {@code users} endpoint. All others are forbidden.
+     *
+     * @param req {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, AuthorizationException&gt; authorize(HttpServletRequest req,
+            AuthorizationContext context) {
+
+        final String endpoint = getResourceName(req);
+        if (endpointChecker.check(endpoint)) {
+            context.setAttribute(&quot;AuthorizationResult&quot;, &quot;success&quot;);
+            return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.success());
+        }
+        return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(AuthorizationResult.failure(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: &quot; + endpoint,
+                json(object(field(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)))));
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Gets the resource name from the {@code HttpServletRequest}.
+     *
+     * @param req The {@code HttpServletRequest} instance.
+     * @return The resource name.
+     */
+    private String getResourceName(final HttpServletRequest req) {
+        String requestUri = req.getRequestURI();
+        int index = requestUri.lastIndexOf(&quot;/&quot;);
+        if (index == requestUri.length() - 1) {
+            index = requestUri.lastIndexOf(&quot;/&quot;, index - 1);
+        }
+        return requestUri.substring(index).replaceAll(&quot;/&quot;, &quot;&quot;);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzbasicservletpackageinfojava"></a>

+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the

+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.

+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+

+package org.forgerock.authz.basic.servlet;

<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2crestOAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactoryjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/crest/OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/crest/OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/crest/OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,80 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.crest;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.basic.crest.SimpleResource;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.AuthorizationFilters;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.AccessTokenValidationResponse;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.OAuth2AccessTokenValidator;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.OAuth2Authorization;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ConnectionFactory;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.Resources;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.Router;
+
+import java.util.Collections;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.resource.RoutingMode.STARTS_WITH;
+
+/**
+ * A factory class for creating an {@code ConnectionFactory} configured with an OAuth2 authorization filter.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public final class OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory {
+
+    private static final SimpleResource SIMPLE_RESOURCE = new SimpleResource();
+
+    /**
+     * Private utility constructor.
+     */
+    private OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory() {
+        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(&quot;OAuth2AuthorizationConnectionFactory cannot be instantiated.&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a {@code ConnectionFactory} with a route to the &quot;resource&quot; endpoint, which is protected by the
+     * OAuth2 authorization filter which will deem an access token valid if it matches the string &quot;VALID&quot; and will
+     * return a scope of &quot;SCOPE&quot; and user info of &quot;UID&quot;-&gt;&quot;DEMO&quot;.
+     *
+     * @return A {@code ConnectionFactory} instance.
+     */
+    public static ConnectionFactory getConnectionFactory() {
+
+        OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule authorizationModule = OAuth2Authorization.forCrest(
+                new OAuth2AccessTokenValidator() {
+                    @Override
+                    public AccessTokenValidationResponse validate(String accessToken) {
+                        if (&quot;VALID&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(accessToken)) {
+                            return new AccessTokenValidationResponse(System.currentTimeMillis() + 5000,
+                                    Collections.&lt;String, Object&gt;singletonMap(&quot;UID&quot;, &quot;DEMO&quot;),
+                                    Collections.singleton(&quot;SCOPE&quot;));
+                        } else {
+                            return new AccessTokenValidationResponse(0);
+                        }
+                    }
+                }, Collections.&lt;String&gt;emptySet(), false, 0);
+
+        final Router router = new Router();
+
+        router.addRoute(STARTS_WITH, &quot;/resource&quot;, AuthorizationFilters.createFilter(SIMPLE_RESOURCE,
+                authorizationModule));
+
+        return Resources.newInternalConnectionFactory(router);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2servletOAuth2AuthorizationFactoryjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/servlet/OAuth2AuthorizationFactory.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/servlet/OAuth2AuthorizationFactory.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/servlet/OAuth2AuthorizationFactory.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.servlet;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.AuthorizationModuleFactory;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.AccessTokenValidationResponse;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.OAuth2AccessTokenValidator;
+import org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.OAuth2Authorization;
+
+import java.util.Collections;
+
+import static org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.AuthorizationModules.newAuthorizationModuleFactory;
+
+/**
+ * A factory class for creating an {@code AuthorizationModuleFactory} configured with an OAuth2 authorization filter.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public final class OAuth2AuthorizationFactory {
+
+    /**
+     * Private utility constructor.
+     */
+    private OAuth2AuthorizationFactory() {
+        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(&quot;OAuth2AuthorizationFactory cannot be instantiated.&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a {@code AuthorizationModuleFactory} for a OAuth2 authorization filter which will deem an access token
+     * valid if it matches the string &quot;VALID&quot; and will return a scope of &quot;SCOPE&quot; and user info of &quot;UID&quot;-&gt;&quot;DEMO&quot;.
+     *
+     * @return A {@code AuthorizationModuleFactory} instance.
+     */
+    public static AuthorizationModuleFactory getAuthorizationModuleFactory() {
+        return newAuthorizationModuleFactory(OAuth2Authorization.forHttpServlet(
+                new OAuth2AccessTokenValidator() {
+                    @Override
+                    public AccessTokenValidationResponse validate(String accessToken) {
+                        if (&quot;VALID&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(accessToken)) {
+                            return new AccessTokenValidationResponse(System.currentTimeMillis() + 5000,
+                                    Collections.&lt;String, Object&gt;singletonMap(&quot;UID&quot;, &quot;DEMO&quot;),
+                                    Collections.singleton(&quot;SCOPE&quot;));
+                        } else {
+                            return new AccessTokenValidationResponse(0);
+                        }
+                    }
+                }, Collections.&lt;String&gt;emptySet(), false, 0));
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrcmainwebappWEBINFwebxml"></a>

</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.

+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include

+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz;
+
+import com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.RestAssuredConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.parsing.Parser;
+import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.given;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
+
+@Test(testName = &quot;AuthorizationContext&quot;)
+public class AuthorizationContextTestCases {
+
+    @BeforeClass
+    public void setUp() {
+        RestAssured.port = Integer.parseInt(System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_PORT&quot;));
+        RestAssured.baseURI = &quot;http://&quot; + System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_HOST&quot;);
+        RestAssured.basePath = System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_URI&quot;);
+        RestAssured.defaultParser = Parser.JSON;
+        RestAssured.config = RestAssuredConfig.newConfig()
+                .encoderConfig(EncoderConfig.encoderConfig().defaultContentCharset(&quot;UTF-8&quot;));
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void shouldReturnAuthorizationContextContents() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;AuthorizationResult&quot;, equalTo(&quot;success&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/servlet/users&quot;);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrctestjavaorgforgerockauthzBasicCrestTestCasesjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/test/java/org/forgerock/authz/BasicCrestTestCases.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/test/java/org/forgerock/authz/BasicCrestTestCases.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/authz-framework-functional-tests/src/test/java/org/forgerock/authz/BasicCrestTestCases.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,623 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz;
+
+import com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.RestAssuredConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.parsing.Parser;
+import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.given;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasEntry;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasItem;
+
+@Test(testName = &quot;BasicCrestTestCases&quot;)
+public class BasicCrestTestCases {
+
+    @BeforeClass
+    public void setUp() {
+        RestAssured.port = Integer.parseInt(System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_PORT&quot;));
+        RestAssured.baseURI = &quot;http://&quot; + System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_HOST&quot;);
+        RestAssured.basePath = System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_URI&quot;);
+        RestAssured.defaultParser = Parser.JSON;
+        RestAssured.config = RestAssuredConfig.newConfig()
+                .encoderConfig(EncoderConfig.encoderConfig().defaultContentCharset(&quot;UTF-8&quot;));
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowCreateRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(201).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;create&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowReadRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;read&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users/demo&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowUpdateRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;update&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users/demo&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowDeleteRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;delete&quot;)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users/demo&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowPatchRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;patch&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users/demo&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowActionCollectionRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;actionCollection&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowActionRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;action&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users/demo&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysAllowAuthorizationShouldAllowQueryRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;result&quot;, hasItem(hasEntry(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;queryCollection&quot;))).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/users&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysDenyAuthorizationShouldDenyCreateRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/roles&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysDenyAuthorizationShouldDenyReadRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/roles/admin&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void alwaysDenyAuthorizationShouldDenyUpdateRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/roles/admin&quot;);
+    }
+

+    public void alwaysDenyAuthorizationShouldDenyDeleteRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/roles/admin&quot;);
+    }

+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).

+            expect().

+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).

+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/simple/roles&quot;);
+    }

+    @Test
+    public void notActionAuthorizationShouldAllowCreateRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(201).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;create&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void notActionAuthorizationShouldAllowReadRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {

+            expect().

+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;read&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction/x&quot;);
+    }

+

+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).

+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;update&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction/x&quot;);
+    }

+            expect().

+    public void notActionAuthorizationShouldAllowPatchRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;patch&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void  notActionAuthorizationShouldDenyActionCollectionRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Action is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction/x&quot;);
+    }
+

+    public void notActionAuthorizationShouldDenyActionRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+

+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Action is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction/x&quot;);
+    }

+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;result&quot;, hasItem(hasEntry(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;queryCollection&quot;))).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/notAction&quot;);
+    }

+    @Test
+    public void notCreateOrPatchAuthorizationShouldDenyCreateRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Create is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/notCreateOrPatch&quot;);
+    }
+

+    public void notCreateOrPatchAuthorizationShouldAllowReadRequestsToUsersEndpoint() {

+            expect().

+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;read&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/notCreateOrPatch/x&quot;);
+    }

+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Patch is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/basic/crest/notCreateOrPatch/x&quot;);
+    }

+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyCreateRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Create is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyReadRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Read is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyUpdateRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Update is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyDeleteRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Delete is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyPatchRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Patch is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyActionCollectionRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Action is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyActionRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Action is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/basic/crest/none/x&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void noneAuthorizationShouldDenyQueryRequestsToRolesEndpoint() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Query is not allowed&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/crest/none&quot;);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>

</span><ins>+/*

+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz;
+
+import com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.RestAssuredConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.parsing.Parser;
+import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.given;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasEntry;
+
+@Test(testName = &quot;BasicHttpServletTestCases&quot;)
+public class BasicHttpServletTestCases {
+
+    @BeforeClass
+    public void setUp() {
+        RestAssured.port = Integer.parseInt(System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_PORT&quot;));
+        RestAssured.baseURI = &quot;http://&quot; + System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_HOST&quot;);
+        RestAssured.basePath = System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_URI&quot;);
+        RestAssured.defaultParser = Parser.JSON;
+        RestAssured.config = RestAssuredConfig.newConfig()
+                .encoderConfig(EncoderConfig.encoderConfig().defaultContentCharset(&quot;UTF-8&quot;));
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void usersAllowed() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/servlet/users&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void rolesNotAllowed() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Not authorized for endpoint: roles&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;detail&quot;, hasEntry(&quot;internalCode&quot;, 123)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/basic/servlet/roles&quot;);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentauthzframeworkfunctionaltestssrctestjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2crestOAuth2CrestAuthorizationModuleTestCasesjava"></a>
