</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.crest;
+
+import com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.RestAssuredConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.parsing.Parser;
+import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.given;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasEntry;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasItem;
+
+@Test(testName = &quot;OAuth2Crest&quot;)
+public class OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModuleTestCases {
+
+    @BeforeClass
+    public void setUp() {
+        RestAssured.port = Integer.parseInt(System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_PORT&quot;));
+        RestAssured.baseURI = &quot;http://&quot; + System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_HOST&quot;);
+        RestAssured.basePath = System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_URI&quot;);
+        RestAssured.defaultParser = Parser.JSON;
+        RestAssured.config = RestAssuredConfig.newConfig()
+                .encoderConfig(EncoderConfig.encoderConfig().defaultContentCharset(&quot;UTF-8&quot;));
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void createNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void readNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void updateNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void deleteNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void patchNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionCollectionNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionInstanceNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void queryAllowNotAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void createAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(201).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;create&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void readAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;read&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void updateAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;update&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void deleteAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;delete&quot;)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void patchAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;patch&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionCollectionAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;actionCollection&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionInstanceAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;operation&quot;, equalTo(&quot;action&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void queryAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+                body(&quot;result&quot;, hasItem(hasEntry(&quot;operation&quot;, &quot;queryCollection&quot;))).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void createNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void readNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void updateNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void deleteNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void patchNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionCollectionNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionInstanceNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void queryNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_queryId&quot;, &quot;QUERY_ID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void createNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;create&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void readNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void updateNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                put(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void deleteNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                delete(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void patchNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;[{\&quot;operation\&quot;: \&quot;add\&quot;, \&quot;field\&quot;: \&quot;FIELD\&quot;, \&quot;value\&quot;: \&quot;VALUE\&quot;}]&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                patch(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource/a&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionCollectionNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+                body(&quot;{}&quot;).
+                queryParam(&quot;_action&quot;, &quot;ACTION&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                post(&quot;/modules/oauth2/crest/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void actionInstanceNotAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+

+                header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;).

+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.servlet;
+
+import com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.EncoderConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.config.RestAssuredConfig;
+import com.jayway.restassured.parsing.Parser;
+import org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static com.jayway.restassured.RestAssured.given;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
+import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.hasEntry;
+
+@Test(testName = &quot;OAuth2HttpServlet&quot;)
+public class OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModuleTestCases {
+
+    @BeforeClass
+    public void setUp() {
+        RestAssured.port = Integer.parseInt(System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_PORT&quot;));
+        RestAssured.baseURI = &quot;http://&quot; + System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_HOST&quot;);
+        RestAssured.basePath = System.getProperty(&quot;AUTHZ_URI&quot;);
+        RestAssured.defaultParser = Parser.JSON;
+        RestAssured.config = RestAssuredConfig.newConfig()
+                .encoderConfig(EncoderConfig.encoderConfig().defaultContentCharset(&quot;UTF-8&quot;));
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void notAllowedWhenNoAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/servlet/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void allowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderSet() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(200).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/servlet/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void notAllowedWhenAccessTokenHeaderIsNotBearer() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;NotBearer VALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is null.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/servlet/resource&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void notAllowedWhenAccessTokenIsInvalid() {
+
+        given().
+                header(&quot;Authorization&quot;, &quot;Bearer INVALID&quot;).
+            expect().
+                statusCode(403).
+                body(&quot;code&quot;, equalTo(403)).
+                body(&quot;reason&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Forbidden&quot;)).
+                body(&quot;message&quot;, equalTo(&quot;Access Token is invalid.&quot;)).
+            when().
+                get(&quot;/modules/oauth2/servlet/resource&quot;);
+    }
+}

- * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.

- */

-package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
-
-import org.forgerock.authz.AuthorizationException;
-import org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue;
-import org.slf4j.Logger;
-import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
-
-import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
-import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
-
-/**
- * Factory class for creating OAuth2AccessTokenValidators from a given fully qualified class name.
- *
- * @since 1.4.0
- */
-public class AccessTokenValidatorFactory {
-
-    private final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AccessTokenValidatorFactory.class);
-
-    /**
-     * Creates an instance of the given OAuth2AccessTokenValidator class.
-     * &lt;br/&gt;
-     * Initially tries to use a single-arg constructor which takes a JsonValue containing the module configuration, if
-     * that fails then uses the zero-arg constructor.
-     *
-     * @param className The fully qualified class name of the OAuth2AccessTokenValidator.
-     * @param config The module configuration.
-     * @return An instance of the OAuth2AccessTokenValidator.
-     * @throws AuthorizationException If the OAuth2AccessTokenValidator could not be constructed.
-     * @throws NullPointerException If the className is &lt;code&gt;null&lt;/code&gt;.
-     */
-    public OAuth2AccessTokenValidator getInstance(final String className, final JsonValue config) {
-
-        if (className == null) {
-            throw new NullPointerException(&quot;OAuth2AccessTokenValidator class name cannot be null.&quot;);
-        }
-
-        try {
-            Class&lt;? extends OAuth2AccessTokenValidator&gt; accessTokenValidatorClass =
-                    Class.forName(className).asSubclass(OAuth2AccessTokenValidator.class);
-
-            Constructor&lt;? extends OAuth2AccessTokenValidator&gt; constructor;
-            Object[] params = new Object[]{config};
-            try {
-                constructor = accessTokenValidatorClass.getConstructor(JsonValue.class);
-            } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
-                constructor = accessTokenValidatorClass.getConstructor();
-                params = new Object[0];
-            }
-
-            return constructor.newInstance(params);
-
-        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
-            logger.error(&quot;Failed to find AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-            throw new AuthorizationException(&quot;Failed to find AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-        } catch (InstantiationException e) {
-            logger.error(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-            throw new AuthorizationException(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-        } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
-            logger.error(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-            throw new AuthorizationException(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-        } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
-            logger.error(&quot;AccessTokenValidatorClass must have a zero-arg constructor or a single arg constructor &quot;
-                    + &quot;that accepts a JsonValue.&quot;, e);
-            throw new AuthorizationException(&quot;AccessTokenValidatorClass must have a zero-arg constructor or a &quot;
-                    + &quot;single arg constructor that accepts a JsonValue.&quot;, e);
-        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
-            logger.error(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-            throw new AuthorizationException(&quot;Failed to create AccessTokenValidatorClass.&quot;, e);
-        }
-    }
-}
</del></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2BearerTokenExtractorjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/BearerTokenExtractor.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/BearerTokenExtractor.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/BearerTokenExtractor.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
+
+import org.slf4j.Logger;
+import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
+
+/**
+ * Extracts the bearer token from the request's authorization header.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+class BearerTokenExtractor {
+
+    private static final String BEARER_TOKEN_KEY = &quot;BEARER&quot;;
+
+    private final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BearerTokenExtractor.class);
+
+    /**
+     * Pulls the access token off of the request, by looking for the Authorization header containing a Bearer token.
+     *
+     * @param authorizationHeader The authorization header from the request.
+     * @return The access token, or &lt;code&gt;null&lt;/code&gt; if the access token was not present or was not using Bearer
+     * authorization.
+     */
+    String getAccessToken(String authorizationHeader) {
+
+        if (authorizationHeader == null) {
+            logger.debug(&quot;Authorization header not present&quot;);
+            return null;
+        }
+        final int index = authorizationHeader.indexOf(' ');
+        if (index &lt;= 0) {
+            logger.debug(&quot;Invalid Authorization header&quot;);
+            return null;
+        }
+
+        final String tokenType = authorizationHeader.substring(0, index);
+
+        if (BEARER_TOKEN_KEY.equalsIgnoreCase(tokenType)) {
+            return authorizationHeader.substring(index + 1);
+        }
+
+        logger.debug(&quot;Unknown Access Token Type, {}&quot;, tokenType);
+        return null;
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2JsonParserjava"></a>
<div class="modfile"><h4>Modified: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/JsonParser.java (2062 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/JsonParser.java        2014-05-23 13:13:45 UTC (rev 2062)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/JsonParser.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@
</span><span class="cx">      * @return A JsonValue
</span><span class="cx">      * @throws IOException If the String could not be parsed.
</span><span class="cx">      */
</span><del>-    public JsonValue parse(final String s) throws IOException {
</del><ins>+    public JsonValue parse(String s) throws IOException {
</ins><span class="cx">         return new JsonValue(MAPPER.readValue(s, Map.class));
</span><span class="cx">     }
</span><span class="cx"> }
</span></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2OAuth2Authorizationjava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2Authorization.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2Authorization.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2Authorization.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,140 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
+
+import java.util.Set;
+
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.field;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.json;
+import static org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue.object;
+
+/**
+ * Utility class providing convenience methods for creating both {@link OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule}s and
+ * {@link OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule}s.
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public final class OAuth2Authorization {
+
+    static final String TOKEN_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY = &quot;token-info-endpoint&quot;;
+    static final String USER_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY = &quot;user-info-endpoint&quot;;
+
+    /**
+     * Private utility constructor.
+     */
+    private OAuth2Authorization() {
+        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(&quot;OAuth2Authorization cannot be instantiated.&quot;);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.
+     *
+     * @param accessTokenValidator A {@code OAuth2AccessTokenValidator} instance.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @param cacheEnabled {@code true} if the cache should be used.
+     * @param cacheSize The size of the cache. Only used if {@code cacheEnabled} is set to {@code true}.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule forCrest(OAuth2AccessTokenValidator accessTokenValidator,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes, boolean cacheEnabled, int cacheSize) {
+        return new OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule(new OAuth2Module(accessTokenValidator, requiredScopes,
+                cacheEnabled, cacheSize), new BearerTokenExtractor());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.
+     *
+     * @param tokenInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 token info endpoint.
+     * @param userInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 user info endpoint.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @param cacheEnabled {@code true} if the cache should be used.
+     * @param cacheSize The size of the cache. Only used if {@code cacheEnabled} is set to {@code true}.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule forCrest(String tokenInfoEndpoint, String userInfoEndpoint,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes, boolean cacheEnabled, int cacheSize) {
+        return forCrest(new RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator(json(object(
+                        field(TOKEN_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, tokenInfoEndpoint),
+                        field(USER_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, userInfoEndpoint)))), requiredScopes, cacheEnabled, cacheSize);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Creates a new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;Disables the cache.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param tokenInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 token info endpoint.
+     * @param userInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 user info endpoint.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule forCrest(String tokenInfoEndpoint, String userInfoEndpoint,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes) {
+        return forCrest(new RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator(json(object(
+                        field(TOKEN_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, tokenInfoEndpoint),
+                        field(USER_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, userInfoEndpoint)))), requiredScopes, false, 0);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.
+     *
+     * @param accessTokenValidator A {@code OAuth2AccessTokenValidator} instance.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @param cacheEnabled {@code true} if the cache should be used.
+     * @param cacheSize The size of the cache. Only used if {@code cacheEnabled} is set to {@code true}.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule forHttpServlet(OAuth2AccessTokenValidator accessTokenValidator,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes, boolean cacheEnabled, int cacheSize) {
+        return new OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule(new OAuth2Module(accessTokenValidator, requiredScopes,
+                cacheEnabled, cacheSize), new BearerTokenExtractor());
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.
+     *
+     * @param tokenInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 token info endpoint.
+     * @param userInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 user info endpoint.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @param cacheEnabled {@code true} if the cache should be used.
+     * @param cacheSize The size of the cache. Only used if {@code cacheEnabled} is set to {@code true}.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule forHttpServlet(String tokenInfoEndpoint, String userInfoEndpoint,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes, boolean cacheEnabled, int cacheSize) {
+        return forHttpServlet(new RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator(json(object(
+                        field(TOKEN_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, tokenInfoEndpoint),
+                        field(USER_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, userInfoEndpoint)))), requiredScopes, cacheEnabled, cacheSize);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Creates a new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} with the provided configuration parameters.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * &lt;p&gt;Disables the cache.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param tokenInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 token info endpoint.
+     * @param userInfoEndpoint The URI for the OAuth2 user info endpoint.
+     * @param requiredScopes The required OAuth2 scopes for the request to be authorized.
+     * @return A new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} instance.
+     */
+    public static OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule forHttpServlet(String tokenInfoEndpoint, String userInfoEndpoint,
+            Set&lt;String&gt; requiredScopes) {
+        return forHttpServlet(new RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator(json(object(
+                        field(TOKEN_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, tokenInfoEndpoint),
+                        field(USER_INFO_ENDPOINT_KEY, userInfoEndpoint)))), requiredScopes, false, 0);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModulejava"></a>
<div class="addfile"><h4>Added: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule.java (0 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>
<span class="info">--- forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule.java                                (rev 0)
+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,228 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationContext;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationException;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.crest.api.CrestAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.DeleteRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.PatchRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.SecurityContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.ServerContext;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.UpdateRequest;
+import org.forgerock.json.resource.servlet.HttpContext;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.AsyncFunction;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
+import org.slf4j.Logger;
+import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
+
+/**
+ * &lt;p&gt;An implementation of a {@code CrestAuthorizationModule} which uses a OAuth2 Access Token from the
+ * {@code Authorization} header from the request.&lt;/p&gt;
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule implements CrestAuthorizationModule {
+
+    private final OAuth2Module oAuth2Module;
+    private final BearerTokenExtractor bearerTokenExtractor;
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule}.
+     *
+     * @param oAuth2Module A {@code OAuth2Module} instance.
+     * @param bearerTokenExtractor A {@code BearerTokenExtractor} instance.
+     */
+    OAuth2CrestAuthorizationModule(OAuth2Module oAuth2Module, BearerTokenExtractor bearerTokenExtractor) {
+        this.oAuth2Module = oAuth2Module;
+        this.bearerTokenExtractor = bearerTokenExtractor;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST create request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeCreate(ServerContext context,
+            CreateRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST read request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeRead(ServerContext context, ReadRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST update request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeUpdate(ServerContext context,
+            UpdateRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST delete request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeDelete(ServerContext context,
+            DeleteRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST patch request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizePatch(ServerContext context, PatchRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST action request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeAction(ServerContext context,
+            ActionRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received REST query request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param request {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeQuery(ServerContext context, QueryRequest request) {
+
+        String accessToken = getAccessToken(context);
+        SecurityContext securityContext = context.asContext(SecurityContext.class);
+        AuthorizationContext authorizationContext = new AuthorizationContext();
+
+        return authorizeOAuth2Token(accessToken, securityContext, authorizationContext);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Pulls the access token off of the request, by looking for the Authorization header containing a Bearer token.
+     *
+     * @param context The {@link ServerContext} representing the context of the request.
+     * @return The access token, or &lt;code&gt;null&lt;/code&gt; if the access token was not present or was not using Bearer
+     * authorization.
+     */
+    private String getAccessToken(ServerContext context) {
+        HttpContext httpContext = context.asContext(HttpContext.class);
+        String header = httpContext.getHeaderAsString(&quot;authorization&quot;);
+        return bearerTokenExtractor.getAccessToken(header);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Performs the call to the {@code OAuth2Module} to perform the authorization and handles the result asynchronously.
+     *
+     * @param accessToken The OAuth2 access token.
+     * @param securityContext The {@link SecurityContext} of the request.
+     * @param authorizationContext The {@link AuthorizationContext} holding all the authorization context for the
+     *                             request.
+     * @return A {@code Promise} with the result of the authorization and the handling of the result.
+     */
+    private Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; authorizeOAuth2Token(String accessToken,
+            final SecurityContext securityContext, final AuthorizationContext authorizationContext) {
+
+        return oAuth2Module.authorize(accessToken, authorizationContext)
+            .thenAsync(
+                    new AsyncFunction&lt;AuthorizationResult, AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt;() {
+                        @Override
+                        public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; apply(AuthorizationResult result) {
+//                            securityContext.getAuthorizationId().putAll(authorizationContext.getAttributes());    //TODO cannot add to the authzId as SecurityContext ensures this....
+                            return Promises.newSuccessfulPromise(result);
+                        }
+                    }, new AsyncFunction&lt;AuthorizationException, AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt;() {
+                        @Override
+                        public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, ResourceException&gt; apply(AuthorizationException e) {
+                            return Promises.newFailedPromise(ResourceException.getException(
+                                    ResourceException.INTERNAL_ERROR, e.getMessage(), e));
+                        }
+                    }
+            );
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModulejava"></a>

+++ forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule.java        2014-05-23 14:23:48 UTC (rev 2063)
</span><span class="lines">@@ -0,0 +1,77 @@
</span><ins>+/*
+ * The contents of this file are subject to the terms of the Common Development and
+ * Distribution License (the License). You may not use this file except in compliance with the
+ * License.
+ *
+ * You can obtain a copy of the License at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. See the License for the
+ * specific language governing permission and limitations under the License.
+ *
+ * When distributing Covered Software, include this CDDL Header Notice in each file and include
+ * the License file at legal/CDDLv1.0.txt. If applicable, add the following below the CDDL
+ * Header, with the fields enclosed by brackets [] replaced by your own identifying
+ * information: &quot;Portions copyright [year] [name of copyright owner]&quot;.
+ *
+ * Copyright 2014 ForgeRock AS.
+ */
+
+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
+
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationContext;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationException;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.servlet.api.HttpServletAuthorizationModule;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.slf4j.Logger;
+import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
+
+import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
+
+/**
+ * &lt;p&gt;An implementation of a {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule} which uses a OAuth2 Access Token from the
+ * {@code Authorization} header from the request.&lt;/p&gt;
+ *
+ * @since 1.5.0
+ */
+public class OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule implements HttpServletAuthorizationModule {
+
+    private final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule.class);
+
+    private final OAuth2Module oAuth2Module;
+    private final BearerTokenExtractor bearerTokenExtractor;
+
+    /**
+     * Creates a new {@code OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule}.
+     *
+     * @param oAuth2Module A {@code OAuth2Module} instance.
+     * @param bearerTokenExtractor A {@code BearerTokenExtractor} instance.
+     */
+    OAuth2HttpServletAuthorizationModule(OAuth2Module oAuth2Module, BearerTokenExtractor bearerTokenExtractor) {
+        this.oAuth2Module = oAuth2Module;
+        this.bearerTokenExtractor = bearerTokenExtractor;
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * &lt;p&gt;Authorizes a received HTTP Servlet request using the OAuth2 Access Token present in the request header.&lt;/p&gt;
+     *
+     * @param req {@inheritDoc}
+     * @param context {@inheritDoc}
+     * @return {@inheritDoc}
+     */
+    @Override
+    public Promise&lt;AuthorizationResult, AuthorizationException&gt; authorize(HttpServletRequest req,
+            AuthorizationContext context) {
+        return oAuth2Module.authorize(getAccessToken(req), context);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Pulls the access token off of the request, by looking for the Authorization header containing a Bearer token.
+     *
+     * @param req The HttpServletRequest.
+     * @return The access token, or &lt;code&gt;null&lt;/code&gt; if the access token was not present or was not using Bearer
+     * authorization.
+     */
+    private String getAccessToken(final HttpServletRequest req) {
+        String header = req.getHeader(&quot;Authorization&quot;);
+        return bearerTokenExtractor.getAccessToken(header);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
<a id="forgerockauthfilterstrunkforgerockauthzfilterparentforgerockauthzmodulesforgerockauthzoauth2modulesrcmainjavaorgforgerockauthzmodulesoauth2OAuth2Modulejava"></a>
<div class="modfile"><h4>Modified: forgerock-auth-filters/trunk/forgerock-authz-filter-parent/forgerock-authz-modules/forgerock-authz-oauth2-module/src/main/java/org/forgerock/authz/modules/oauth2/OAuth2Module.java (2062 => 2063)</h4>
<pre class="diff"><span>

</span><span class="lines">@@ -16,40 +16,30 @@
</span><span class="cx"> 
</span><span class="cx"> package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;
</span><span class="cx"> 
</span><del>-import org.forgerock.authz.AuthorizationContext;
-import org.forgerock.authz.AuthorizationException;
-import org.forgerock.authz.AuthorizationModule;
-import org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue;
</del><ins>+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationException;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationResult;
+import org.forgerock.authz.filter.api.AuthorizationContext;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise;
+import org.forgerock.util.promise.Promises;
</ins><span class="cx"> import org.slf4j.Logger;
</span><span class="cx"> import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
</span><span class="cx"> 
</span><del>-import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
-import java.util.Collections;
</del><span class="cx"> import java.util.HashSet;
</span><span class="cx"> import java.util.Map;
</span><span class="cx"> import java.util.Set;
</span><span class="cx"> 
</span><span class="cx"> /**
</span><del>- * OAuth2 authorization module that provide authorization based on an access token included in the request.
- * &lt;br/&gt;
- * The module uses AccessTokenValidators to perform the actual validation of access tokens and retrieve user profile
</del><ins>+ * &lt;p&gt;OAuth2 authorization module that provide authorization based on an access token included in the request.&lt;/p&gt;
+ *
+ * &lt;p&gt;The module uses AccessTokenValidators to perform the actual validation of access tokens and retrieve user profile
</ins><span class="cx">  * information as a method of providing a layer of abstraction so the module can work with many different OAuth2
</span><del>- * Providers.
- * &lt;br/&gt;
- * This module requires the configuration given at initialisation to contain the following entries:
- * &lt;ul&gt;
- *     &lt;li&gt;access-token-validator-class - the fully qualified class name of the AccessTokenValidator class which will
- *     provide the validation logic for determining if an access token is valid or not&lt;/li&gt;
- *     &lt;li&gt;required-scopes - the scopes the access token must have to be authorized. Defaults to an empty list&lt;/li&gt;
- *     &lt;li&gt;cacheEnabled - whether to cache response. Defaults to true&lt;/li&gt;
- *     &lt;li&gt;cache-size - the maximum size of the cache. Defaults to 100&lt;/li&gt;
- * &lt;/ul&gt;
- * &lt;br/&gt;
- * Note: the individual AccessTokenValidators may required their own configuration.
</del><ins>+ * Providers.&lt;/p&gt;
</ins><span class="cx">  *
</span><ins>+ * &lt;p&gt;Note: the individual AccessTokenValidators may required their own configuration.&lt;/p&gt;
+ *

</span><del>-        final AccessTokenValidationResponse validationResponse =

</ins><span class="cx"> 
</span><span class="cx">         //Then

</span><ins>+        assertEquals(validationResponse.getExpiryTime(), expiryTime);
</ins><span class="cx">         assertTrue(validationResponse.getProfileInformation().isEmpty());
</span><span class="cx">         assertTrue(validationResponse.getTokenScopes().isEmpty());
</span><span class="cx">     }

+package org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2;

+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
+import static org.testng.Assert.assertEquals;
+import static org.testng.Assert.assertNotNull;
+
+public class OAuth2ExceptionTest {
+
+    @Test
+    public void shouldCreateWithMessage() {
+
+        //Given
+
+
+        //When
+        OAuth2Exception exception = new OAuth2Exception(&quot;MESSAGE&quot;);
+
+        //Then
+        assertNotNull(exception);
+        assertEquals(exception.getMessage(), &quot;MESSAGE&quot;);
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    public void shouldCreateWithMessageAndCause() {
+
+        //Given
+        Throwable cause = mock(Throwable.class);
+
+        //When
+        OAuth2Exception exception = new OAuth2Exception(&quot;MESSAGE&quot;, cause);
+
+        //Then
+        assertNotNull(exception);
+        assertEquals(exception.getMessage(), &quot;MESSAGE&quot;);
+        assertEquals(exception.getCause(), cause);
+    }
+}
</ins></span></pre></div>
